name: CBM Poker Tournament
overview: CBM Poker Tournament (also called Speech Poker Tournament) is a single player poker game for the Commodore 64. It uses The Software Automatic Mouth (SAM) for the in-game speech. Despite being released and published by Commodore themselves, the game is considered slightly politically correct, as many of the opponents in the game utter words such as "arse, f*ck, and shit" when they have to fold.
